phrases: She said she wants to take a shower.
So you want me to check on her one more time?
This kind of thing gets the blood pumpin', ya know?
It is the first day of the Grand Magic Games.
The battle part continues with the second match,
featuring Ren Akatsuki of Blue Pegasus versus
It looks like you have improved since last year, Arania.
Are you sure it is okay for a member of Blue Pegasus to attack a woman, Ren-chan?
It seems like both opponents are standing their ground!
It should be a good match!
Sherry is cheering you on from the stands!
You do not root for members of an enemy team!
We just happen to be stuck with each other is all!
It is annoying the way you are always by my side...
Sherry sure fell in love with a pain in the ass.
The one thing I cannot do is look lame
The winner... Ren Akatsuki of Blue Pegasus!
With this, Blue Pegasus has 14 points for the first day!
Shoot... I let down my guard...
Unsurprisingly, he is improved compared to seven years ago.
Do not tell me that Ichiya's gotten stronger, too?!
Natsu, what are you talking about?
Ichiya has always been a man to reckon with.
His personality leaves something to be desired,
but there is no denying that he is Blue Pegasus's strongest wizard.
I suddenly want to fight him!
is that person in the bunny costume.
So it is alright to be bugged by that...
I thought maybe we were not supposed to mention it.
Next up, the third match of day one!
versus Orga Nanagear of Team Sabertooth!
You can beat him, War Cry!
I am only interested... in you...
We finally get to see a Sabertooth battle.
I wonder if he is as strong as that masked ball guy...
Who do you think is going to win, Lecter?
Sting-kun is number one, but everyone in Sabertooth is strong!
You really are dumb, Frosch, if you do not even know that.
That is a funny phrase, is not it?
What kind of magic is that?!
Orga's Black Lightning fried the tears instantaneously!
The winner is Orga Nanagear of Sabertooth!
That brings their total to 20 points!
Could not you have made it more fun, Orga?!
That is not what I meant!
What does Orga Nanagear want to say?!
The strongest, the strongest, number one!
The strongest, the strongest, number one!
The strongest, the strongest, number one!
They really do have raw power... and popularity...
They are the strongest guild, huh?
I hate to admit it, but those guys are impressive.
Alright, it is time for the final match of the first day.
The teams that are left are Fairy Tail B and Lamia Scale, right?
Long ago, these two guilds were about equal in terms of talent,
so this should be an interesting match!
Okay, I will announce the first day's final fight match-up!
It is Mystogan of Fairy Tail B versus
I have been waiting to see Jura!
I never thought he would participate from the first day!
Even in Fairy Tail, those who know his true face are few...
This match is as good as over.
It has not even started yet!
That Jura person sure is popular.
He is one of the Ten Great Wizard Saints.
Is that cueball really that strong?
I do not even know if Erza and I could beat him working together...
Personally, I am rooting for Fairy Tail,
but our Obaba is really strict about that...
My apologies, but I am not going to hold back here.
This is not exactly what I am here for,
but being able to fight on behalf of Fairy Tail...
No need to worry, First Master.
That man was once a Wizard Saint himself.
In other words, you could say their talents are equal.
I-I want to go to the ladies' room...
Even though you are a ghost?!
His cover will not be blown, will it?
I pray he does not make a mess of it...
Mainly, I hope he does not try to impress Erza.
Jura Neekis of Lamia Scale versus
Let the final match of the day...
What I can do for Fairy Tail...
Five Layered Magic Circle... Sacred Song!
So he is copying Mystogan's magic...
There is no need to worry.
I believe Jura-san is Fiore's number one wizard.
Three Layered Magic Circle... Mirror Water!
That is some kind of strong!
He is not called one of the Ten Great Wizard Saints for nothing!
Hurry up and finish him off!
As I suspected, he is not an opponent I can beat with borrowed magic.
He must have drawn them while defending from the attack.
Be judged by the seven stars!
So Makarov-dono was not being entirely candid with me.
A gathering of the Ten Great Wizard Saints is coming soon...
but I never imagined you would pose as a member of Fairy Tail.
I have to win for Fairy Tail.
I am going to use that!
If you use that, your cover will be blown!
What the hell is he thinking?!
This is what is wrong with men!
Their pride gets the better of them!
And now, he is started laughing!
I do not really understand it, but Mystogan is down!
We cannot afford to let Jellal stand out too much.
The winner is Jura Neekis of Lamia Scale!
And with this, the first day of the Grand Magic Games comes to a close!
A team has zero points and B team has one point?!
We should not have participated in this thing after all...
It is no surprise that Sabertooth is number one.
On the other hand, Fairy Tail, which has two teams,
It is still just the first day.
I am hoping for a comeback drama from tomorrow on.
And my guild still has a shot at victory.
I cannot wait for day two!
Yajima-san, Jenny-san, thank you very much for your commentary today.
What is he, in charge of Fairy Tail's gags?!
What the hell were you doing?!
I cannot even find the words to respond.
It was the end of the first day of the Grand Magic Games.
We, Fairy Tail, made a terrible showing...
Several days after the end of the Grand Magic Games...
This is for you, my dear friend, Lucy Heartfilia.
I will be in it tomorrow!
And I swear I will turn things around for us!
Natsu, we are in last place!
We will turn the tables on'them starting now!
Especially with me participatin' in the next competition!
I wonder what kind of competition that will be...
No matter what kind of competition, I am going to win it!
It looks like that jerk from Saber and Gajeel are going to be in it, too!
I am counting on you, Natsu!
But Chariot, that is like a vehicle pulled by horses, right?
I have got a bad feeling about this...
See ya from the winner's circle!
